meeting_info.location: Dallas City Hall, 6FN - Park and Recreation Board Room and Videoconference

agenda_items.title: Approval of the April 18, 2024, Arts and Culture Advisory Commission meeting minutes
Recommendation of thirty-one (31) new panelists to the Office of Arts and Culture’s Funding Programs Review Panel
Recommendation of Sujin Lim as Public Art Project Finalist for the Public Art project to be located at Crockett Dog Park, Council District 2
Recommendation of eight (8) new Public Art selection panel nominees for the term beginning on May 17, 2024
Recommendation of the relocation of Four Chromatic Gates from storage to Glencoe Park, Council District 14
Chair’s Report – Welcome address to Commission; Commissioner Liaison Expectations & Assignment Updates
Cultural Spotlight: Theatre Three
agenda_items.presenter: Kat Edwards, Jeffrey Schmidt, Christie Vela

agenda_items.title: Director’s Update – Staffing update; Public Art Dedication; AAPI Festival
